channel.title: Age of Ravens: Your New Home in the Outworld Colonies
channel.description: ![sid|690x253,50%](upload://4YuHBC6Ie0obzuAbNJbisxkfAxl.jpeg) Today on the Gauntlet Blog I offers collection of sci-fi scenario starters. While they’re tuned for my Alpha Centauri colony hack, you could adapt these to other settings. Plus: lists! Yum. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/age-of-ravens-your-new-home-in-the-outworld-colonies

item.title: Age of Ravens: Your New Home in the Outworld Colonies
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:


Today on the Gauntlet Blog I offers collection of sci-fi scenario starters. While they’re tuned for my Alpha Centauri colony hack, you could adapt these to other settings. Plus: lists! Yum.

THE GAUNTLET

Age of Ravens: Your New Home in the Outworld Colonies

SEEDING SCENARIOS  Mutant: Year Zero has a ton of little tech that I love: community building mechanics, exploration flavor generators, rival/protect questions in character creation. In particular I...
